name: system-info
description: A Svelte/Electron/Typescript application built for a quality user experience when wanting realtime system info.

scripts.install-deps: (cd ui && npm install && npm run dev && cd ..)
scripts.build: npm run install-deps && (cd ui && npm run build && cd ..) && npm run build-backend && electron-builder
scripts.dev: (cd ui && npm run build && cd ..) && npm run start-backend-dev

author: Tyler Laceby
